meanings.definition: To pave or prepare a surface for paving.
meanings.sent1: The workers were prepaving the road before laying down the new asphalt.
meanings.sent2: I will prepave the driveway before the construction crew arrives.
meanings.sent3: The prepaving process made the road look like a giant coloring book waiting to be filled in.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous prepaving of the patio created a smooth canvas for the decorative tiles.
meanings.sent5: The prepaving work was so thorough that the final result was flawless.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing a surface for paving.
meanings.sent1: The prepaving of the parking lot took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: Proper prepaving is essential for a durable and long-lasting pavement.
meanings.sent3: The prepaving of the playground turned into a fun community event with everyone pitching in.
meanings.sent4: The prepaving of the driveway was like setting the stage for a grand performance.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous prepaving of the walkway ensured a smooth and safe path for pedestrians.
